title: Pool Pavilion with Expansive Sundeck, Tranquil Views, Puppy Park
posting_body: Located in North Atlanta, Veridian at Sandy Springs will elevate your life to new levels of luxury.
Choose from a variety of one bedroom or two bedroom Atlanta apartments that are carefully arranged in a fantastic pet-friendly community and feature first-class amenities.

You will look forward to coming home and enjoying a North Atlanta, GA apartment with your very own fireplace, and appreciate the convenience of our state-of-the-art fitness center to use at your leisure.
Our community boasts excellent features including lighted tennis courts and a gorgeously crafted swimming pool, all within close proximity to public transportation.

With easy access to the GA-9, and a location right next door to the Northridge Shopping Center, residents of our pet-friendly Sandy Springs apartments are never far from the best shopping, dining and entertainment in North Atlanta, GA.
Schedule a tour of our luxury community today—don’t miss out on all that our apartments in Sandy Springs, GA have to offer you.
